PhoneAlert_alarmActive: Alarm activated! Long press to deactivate
PhoneAlert_tapToActivate: Tap the button {{count}} times to activate the alarm

PhoneAlert_instructions.activate: In case of emergency, quickly tap the button 3 times to activate the alarm.
PhoneAlert_instructions.deactivate: After the alarm is activated, long press the button for more than 1 second to deactivate the alarm.
